billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

title: Prohibits bonds or notes of public authorities and public benefit corporations from extending beyond period of probable usefulness
summary: Prohibits public authorities and public benefit corporations from issuing bonds and notes for a work or purpose which extends beyond the probable life of the work project.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to bonds and notes of public authorities and public benefit corporations
